definition: China Mobile Tietong, state-owned telecommunications operator (abbr. for 中移鐵通|中移铁通[Zhong1 yi2 Tie3 tong1])
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc

sentences.english: The broadband business is the business of the pillar which China Tietong will be putting Group Strategy Transformation into practice.
sentences.chinese: 寬帶業務是中國鐵通實施集團戰略轉型的支柱業務。

sentences.english: The principles for the construction of IP MAN of CTT's Shandong Branch were presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出了山東鐵通IP城域網組網建設的原則。

definition: to break the door down and enter (idiom)
to have lingering fears/trepidation remaining after a trauma (idiom)
lit. to enter by the back door/fig. to gain influence by pull or unofficial channels/back door or under the counter connections
to move one's base (of operations)/to reposition/to relocate
